title: 071 - LIVE From Orlando
description: On today's show, the guys are live from Orlando, Florida as we are officially in #FightWeek as Pat prepares to detach Adam Cole's head from the rest of his body this Saturday. The guys cover the mansions that they're staying in and give you a peek behind the curtain, cover Digs' wedding and honeymoon and go through the Pod FOD as they get acclimated to their surroundings. Don't forget to send in your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. Stay safe out there, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
